about_the_game:
Slip into the metal shoes of a young, smart robot named Robort. One day, as you are walking to your grandpa’s house, you witness his kidnapping. His garage is left thrashed, his inventions are broken, and all you have is a radio station connecting you to Grandpa. Who did this? What do they want? You must solve this mystery full of brain-scratching riddles, powerful enemies, and unusual worlds.

Connect to different machines and hack their mechanisms by playing classic mini-games wrapped in robot clothes. Complete hundreds of levels in our Arcade room and earn exciting rewards.

All bad guys know that a well-placed killer mega bot here and there greatly enhances their chances of executing their plan for world domination. They don’t know that this just makes your journey more challenging and fun!

Collect hidden fragments and combine them into artefacts on a cosy table in your very own garage. A neatly crafted artefact is a must when dealing with boss bots!

If you must go out there and outwit your enemies, at least do it in style. Customise your robot with hundreds of different combinations! A shark head connected to a jet engine instead of legs makes your journey much more personal.

name: Tiny Robots: Portal Escape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with 1024MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Tiny Robots Portal Escape is an exciting puzzle escape game set in a robot world full of curious characters, colourful levels, and exotic alternative realities. Collect items, look for hidden clues, and solve tricky puzzles. Oh, and don’t forget to save your grandpa from the bad guys!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
